mi:PackageInformation.name: Composite.Tools.FrontendLocalizer
mi:PackageInformation.author: Composite A/S
mi:PackageInformation.TechnicalDetails: Moves strings from XSLT functions and templates to a RESX file and replaces them with their corresponding RESX string names. Used for localization purposes.
mi:PackageInformation.Description: Helps localize strings used in XSLT functions and templates on a website.
